mapper.sql: id, name, description, materialId, processId, categoryId, tips, praise, comment, uid, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_cook_cookBook
name = #{map.name},
description = #{map.description},
materialId = #{map.materialId},
processId = #{map.processId},
categoryId = #{map.categoryId},
tips = #{map.tips},
praise = #{map.praise},
comment = #{map.comment},
uid = #{map.uid},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_cook_cookBook
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND materialId like CONCAT('%', #{materialId} , '%')
AND processId like CONCAT('%', #{processId} , '%')
AND categoryId like CONCAT('%', #{categoryId} , '%')
AND tips like CONCAT('%', #{tips} , '%')
AND praise like CONCAT('%', #{praise} , '%')
AND comment like CONCAT('%', #{comment} , '%')
AND uid like CONCAT('%', #{uid} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
